mapper.insert: insert into apply (cid, sid, ctime, setTime, appointment, appointok, clockin, prohibit, punch) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{settime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appointment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appointok,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prohibit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{punch,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select cid, sid, ctime, setTime, appointment, appointok, clockin, prohibit, punch from apply
mapper.delete: delete from apply where cid = #{cid} and sid = #{sid}
